::Striker::

Striker shakes his head. "My ship was completely destroyed, along with the 
Predacon ship and the space station."

He also looks sadly out the window. "There have been so many Predacon attacks 
recently, that I had no time for leisure. But when I do, I ussually train in 
the holo-rooms."
